CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, 'High'),
IMAGE ("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "RED_Code", 30, 30),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority, 'Medium'),
IMAGE ("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "YELLOW_Code", 30, 30),
IMAGE ("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "GREEN_Code", 30, 30)
)
)
CustomField.label: Priority Flag
